name: gasless-gossip
description: Gasless Gossip - A gamified, on-chain messaging app

scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:deps
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:start
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules api/node_modules web/node_modules api/dist web/.next
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run setup:deps
